title: I'm seing other people's chat when talking to friends
body:
It's happened a few times now, where I'm talking to a friend and they reply with something completely random (presumably from another chat). I attached a screenshot to the post.

I also logged in to the legacy client when this happened to see what it would show. I also attached the corresponding screenshots for that too.

This is pretty serious IMO, some sensitive information could get out this way. I don't know how to replicate the bug, but it's happened at least 2 more times this week.

replies.body: it's not another chat I believe if you scroll up your messages will be towards the top of the chat.. I think it's a bug it will show the latest messages above ones that are from earlier days

I didn't explain this very well, my bad. 

I literally saw him post out of no where _"i think defs if we lack some cc in some comps will be worth"_. It's not old chat history, I screen captured that conversation 30 sec after it happened.
